div.class: inner col col24 first last id224f89c1-b431-479c-933f-efb0e951bec3

li.div: The Gardner Public Schools is beginning to provide virtual sessions. In an effort to protect the safety and confidentiality of our students and families, we ask that parents/guardians and students review the Virtual Live Lessons Disclaimer document. Read on...
Director of Pupil Personnel Services, Joyce West, has provided an update to families regarding special education services. Read on...

Gardner Public Schools will continue providing free meals for students at Gardner High School and Waterford Street School Monday through Friday from 9:30 a.m.-12:30 p.m. The district will also be providing bus stop meals Monday/Wednesday/Friday. Read on...

h4.a: Family Resources & Enrichment Activities for Use During Coronavirus School Closing

li.div: Thank you for your patience as we've developed these resources for your use during the school closing! Please contact your school with any specific questions! Read on...

h4.a: Resources for Families Needing Special Education Services During School Closing

li.div: Please see the attached information regarding GPS Special Education resources. Read on...

Our school-based coordinators connect youth and their families to local resources from mental health and medical providers to housing and heating assistance. Please reach out to our coordinators if you are in need during this critical time. Additional Info...

h4.a: School Committee Approved 2020-2021 School Year Calendar

li.div: Next school year will begin on August 27, 2020 and end on June 10, 2021. Click here for the downloadable calendar!

The Gardner Public Schools does not discriminate due to race, color, sex, gender identity,
